document_data.mainbody:
Front and Centre A Thespians Memoir was an autobiography written by an unknown play actor. It spoke of their great joy of becoming a different individual for a short while.
The author shared their belief that when an individual whose to take on a given role, who they were at their core changed, even if the slightest amount.
* Zevlor, the exiled Hellrider who led a group of tieflings from the city of Elturel in 1492 DR.
